result.arabic_text: وَلَوِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلۡحَقُّ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡ لَفَسَدَتِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمَن فِيهِنَّۚ بَلۡ أَتَيۡنَٰهُم بِذِكۡرِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ عَن ذِكۡرِهِم مُّعۡرِضُونَ
result.translation: 71. Yalli ken nafsih fayxiixa kataataah wohuk tu-keenih madaqak suginnay, Qaranwaa kee baaxooy ken nammayih fanal tanim bayak ten, wonna hinnay ken nabnaay ken sharaf edde yanim keenih bahne (Qhuraan kinnuk) tokkel usun woo Qhuraanat derre caban.
